Plot: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.
Title: Charlie's Angels
Writer: Ryan Rowe, Ed Solomon, John August, Ivan Goff (TV series), Ben Roberts (TV series)
Actors: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Bill Murray
tomatoConsensus: Mixing tongue-in-cheek cheesecake with glossy action set pieces, Charlie's Angels is slick and resonably fun despite its lack of originality.
